const Layout = `

Layout

The responsive grid is based on Flexbox. You can use -sm-, -md-, -lg- and -xl- for responsiveness. As seen in the example, columns must always be direct & only children of rows!

<div class="row"> <div class="col-12"></div> <div class="col-12 col-lg-4"></div> <div class="col-12 col-md-6 col-lg-4"></div> <div class="col-12 col-md-6 col-lg-4"></div> </div>

Grid

The standard gutter is 40px.

col-12
col-12 col-lg-6
col-12 col-lg-6
[nested] col-4
[nested] col-4
[nested] col-4
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-2
col-12 col-lg-8 offset-lg-2
col-12 col-lg
col-12 col-lg-auto
col-12 col-lg-7
col-12 col-lg-5

Gutter

You can cut the gutter in half with g-2 or remove it completely with g-0.

col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
col-12 col-lg-3
 `;
